Other tags have explicit caveats that
column3: proved difficult to remember for the taggers--for instance
column4: there are 37 instances of a PP being tagged with LGS (logical subject) in spite of the guidelines specifically saying
column5: \'[LGS] attaches to the NP object of by and not to the PP node itself.\' CITATION Each mistagging in the test corpus can cause up to two spurious errors
column6: one in precision and one in recall

column1: We have divided them into four categories (given in figure 2) based on those in the bracketing guidelines CITATION
This is concordant with the usage in the maximum entropy literature CITATION
